Application within every week wednesday, will publish by same week thursday.After publishing will be sent a notice mail by official, and to confirm the person himself, it is needed to upload the password provided by the official.Please not that, due to stock condition, publishing can be late.Moreover, if code was not received within 2 weeks after application, please make an enquiry from apps Whie sending mail, to avoid any mistakes, send mail without editing mail text
Want to exchange gold or acorn by below contents?
Application for gift exchanging will be finished by sending mail

[Important] We will contact on same week thursday for all gift applications made by wednesday.Please note that, consumption of golds or acorns will be at the time when you handover a gift.When the mail sending has not been completed, you can not contact us for delivering gift\n\n

resources.string:
Displaying based on special commercial transaction act

Trader AIRCAST KK

Address
0025 Tokyo-to, Chioda-ku,Kanda sakuma-cho 3

Contact
info@photobag.in

Management
Representative Director be

Charges
All digital target contents(Displayed price as per below contents

Method of payment
Android user purchase viaGooglePlay, payment will be done

Payment period
Before offering the contents

Products and service time
After finishing payment procedures, we will provide contents immediately

Expenses other than selling price
 communication charges(internet connection fees included

Cancel policy
Contents can not be returned or exchanged

Operating environment
 Support above android version of 2.2.3
